email.subject: Important: Submit Your Voter Form to Your Election Office
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

One step left! You must submit your signed Registration / Absentee Ballot Request form to your election office. Print, sign and send to the address provided in the instructions, or look up the address in the Election Official Directory

You can check your State Requirements/ Voter Materials Transmission Options to see the various options for returning your form.

Your signature is part of your voter identity, so keep your signature consistent on all voting materials.

If you can't print your form now, here is a link so you can print later: Click to Download Form
This link is valid for 7 days.

Get your Voter Reward Badge!
Choose your favorite Voter Reward Badge to share on social media. Spread the word to other voters! Go here to get your badge: https://www.usvotefoundation.org/voter-reward-badge

Wishing you a great voting experience this year & thank you!
- The team at U.S. Vote Foundation
